security.getUser: select u.user_id, u.na_user, p.profile_id, p.de_profile from profile_user pu inner join profile p on pu.profile_id = p.profile_id inner join public.user u on pu.user_id = u.user_id where u.na_user = $1 and u.pa_user= $2
security.customQuery: UPDATE public.user SET na_user = $1 , pa_user = $2 WHERE user_id = $3;
security.selectUserById: SELECT u.user_id, u.na_user, u.em_user, p.na_person, p.ln_person, p.type_person_id FROM public.user u JOIN person p ON u.person_id = p.person_id WHERE u.user_id = $1;
security.updateInstitution: UPDATE institution SET na_institucion = $1 WHERE institucion_id = $2;
security.selectInstitutions: SELECT institucion_id, name_institutions FROM institution ORDER BY institucion_id;
security.updatePosition: UPDATE position SET na_position = $1 WHERE position_id = $2;
security.selectPositions: SELECT position_id, na_position FROM position ORDER BY position_id;
security.updateProfile: UPDATE profile SET de_profile = $1 WHERE profile_id = $2;
security.selectProfiles: SELECT profile_id, de_profile FROM profile ORDER BY profile_id;
security.updateTypePerson: UPDATE type_person SET de_type_person = $1 WHERE type_person_id = $2;
security.selectTypePersons: SELECT type_person_id, de_type_person FROM type_person ORDER BY type_person_id;
security.insertPerson: INSERT INTO person (na_person, ln_person, type_person_id) VALUES ($1, $2, $3);
security.updatePerson: UPDATE person SET na_person = $1, ln_person = $2, type_person_id = $3 WHERE person_id = $4;
security.selectPersons: SELECT p.person_id, p.na_person, p.ln_person, tp.de_type_person FROM person p JOIN type_person tp ON p.type_person_id = tp.type_person_id ORDER BY p.person_id;

sport.updateEvent: UPDATE event SET na_event = $1 WHERE event_id = $2;
sport.selectEvents: SELECT event_id, na_event FROM event ORDER BY event_id;
sport.selectEventById: SELECT event_id, na_event FROM event WHERE event_id = $1;
sport.updatePlaceEventNameAndUbication: UPDATE place_event SET na_place_event = $1, ubi_place_event = $2 WHERE id_place_event = $3;
sport.updatePlaceEventNameOnly: UPDATE place_event SET na_place_event = $1 WHERE id_place_event = $2;
sport.updatePlaceEventUbicationOnly: UPDATE place_event SET ubi_place_event = $1 WHERE id_place_event = $2;
sport.selectPlaceEvents: SELECT place_event_id, na_place_event, ubi_place_event FROM place_event ORDER BY place_event_id;
sport.updateSportBoth: UPDATE sport SET na_sport = $1, de_sport = $2 WHERE sport_id = $3;
sport.updateSportNameOnly: UPDATE sport SET na_sport = $1 WHERE sport_id = $2;
sport.updateSportDescriptionOnly: UPDATE sport SET de_sport = $1 WHERE sport_id = $2;
sport.selectSports: SELECT sport_id, na_sport, de_sport FROM sport ORDER BY sport_id;
sport.updateTypeCompetition: UPDATE type_competition SET sport_id = $1, na_type_comp = $2 WHERE type_comp_id = $3;
sport.selectTypeCompetition: SELECT type_comp_id, sport_id, na_type_comp FROM type_competition ORDER BY type_comp_id;
sport.insertTypeLineUp: INSERT INTO type_line-up (de_line-up, na_line-up, sport_id) VALUES ($1, $2, $3);
sport.updateTypeLineUp: UPDATE type_line-up SET de_line-up = $1, na_line-up = $2, sport_id = $3 WHERE type_line-up_id = $4;
sport.selectTypeLineUp: SELECT type_line-up_id, de_line-up, na_line-up, sport_id FROM type_line-up ORDER BY type_line-up_id;
sport.insertTeam: INSERT INTO team (na_team, sport_id, institution_id) VALUES ($1, $2, $3);
sport.updateTeam: UPDATE team SET na_team = $1, sport_id = $2, institution_id = $3 WHERE team_id = $4;
sport.selectTeams: SELECT team_id, na_team, sport_id, institution_id FROM team ORDER BY team_id;
sport.insertTeamMember: INSERT INTO team_member (team_id, person_id, num_team_member) VALUES ($1, $2, $3);
sport.updateTeamMember: UPDATE team_member SET team_id = $1, person_id = $2, num_team_member = $3 WHERE team_member_id = $4;
sport.selectTeamMembers: SELECT team_member_id, team_id, person_id, num_team_member FROM team_member ORDER BY team_member_id;
sport.insertCompetition: INSERT INTO competition (event_id, place_event_id, type_comp_id, date_competition, hour_competition) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5);
sport.updateCompetition: UPDATE competition SET date_competition = $1, hour_competition = $2, type_comp_id = $3, event_id = $4, place_event_id = $5 WHERE competition_id = $6;
sport.selectCompetitions: SELECT competition_id, date_competition, hour_competition, type_comp_id, event_id, place_event_id FROM competition ORDER BY competition_id;
sport.insertSportStatistic: INSERT INTO sport_statistic (statistic_concept_id, team_member_id, comp_id, statistic) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4);
sport.updateSportStatistic: UPDATE sport_statistic SET statistic_concept_id = $1, team_member_id = $2, comp_id = $3, statistic = $4 WHERE sport_statistic_id = $5;
sport.selectSportStatistics: SELECT sport_statistic_id, statistic_concept_id, team_member_id, comp_id, statistic FROM sport_statistic ORDER BY sport_statistic_id;
sport.insertLineUp: INSERT INTO line_up (position_id, type_line_up_id, team_member_id, de_line_up, team_comp_id) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5);
sport.updateLineUp: UPDATE line_up SET position_id = $1, type_line_up_id = $2, team_member_id = $3, de_line_up = $4, team_comp_id = $5 WHERE line_up_id = $6;
sport.selectLineUps: SELECT line_up_id, position_id, type_line_up_id, team_member_id, de_line_up, team_comp_id FROM line_up ORDER BY line_up_id;
